```{r}
Fs=read.csv("Fish.csv") #leer la base de datos
head(Fs)
cor(Fs[1:159,2:7])
```
## A침adimos nuestra nueva caracteristica y asignamos X y Y para nuestro modelo
```{r}
lengths = Fs$Length1 * Fs$Length2 * Fs$Length3
L3 = 10^(log10(lengths)/3)
y = Fs$Weight
cat(" Y -> Weight\nX1 -> Width\nX2 -> L3\n")
```

## Ajuste del modelo de regresi칩n lineal
```{r}
plot(y ~ Fs$Width*L3, col="black", main="Plot")
y_hat <- lm(y ~ Fs$Width*L3)
summary(y_hat)
```
# An치lisis de residuos
```{r}
plot(y_hat, col="green")
```

## El coeficiente de determinaci칩n del modelo 
```{r}
y_hat <- predict(y_hat)
res = y - y_hat
r1 = res^2
r2 = (y-mean(y))^2
rr = 1-(sum(r1)/sum(r2))
cat(" R^2:",rr,"\n")
```
